de.uniba.kinf.jerusalem.gui.view.workpanels

Class JerWorkPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uniba.kinf.jerusalem.gui.view.workpanels.JerWorkPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JerAuthorWorkPanel, JerDocumentWorkPanel, JerEntryWorkPanel, JerPlaceWorkPanel, JerToposInEntryWorkPanel, JerToposWorkPanel

    public abstract class JerWorkPanel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Provides layout and shared functionality for JerWorkPanel subclasses. Defines regex for JerTextField.
    Author:
    Hanno Wierichs
